EEX3830 - Practicum in Exceptional Stude.name: EEX3830 - Practicum in Exceptional Student Education

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text:
Students must apply and be approved for practicum – fingerprinting is required by all school districts prior to placement. All clearances and eligibility are determined by school districts.  

Students must have completed at least 50% of all specialization courses with a letter grade of "C" (2.0) or better before registering and be approved by an advisor to register for the course.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Opportunity to participate in an educational setting for an extended period of time and put into practice exceptional education courses knowledge.
